newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Brussels bourse ends varied day with light gains.
newsitem.headline: Brussels bourse ends varied day with light gains.

text.p: 1440 GMT - Bel-20 index .BFX ended a varied but thinly traded Thursday with light gains as buoyant sentiment overcame nerves and Wall Street edged higher
* Bel-20 index ended 3.60 points or 0.16 percent higher at 2,251.30 with 12 gainers, two unchanged and six losers. Total of 2.6 billion francs of Belgian shares changed hands.
* Polyurethane foam producer Recticel main gainer, up 4.9 percent to 430 francs, followed by film finisher Spector, up 3.2 percent to 2,430 francs after positive news from Wednesday's annual meeting
